about_the_game:
[About the game]
All text in this game was translated by machine translation.

[About the DLC.]
This DLC content is an additional episode of "Cuckold Princess".
In order to play this DLC, you must have the full version of "Cuckold Princess" installed on your computer.

Adding this DLC will allow you to play the following additional episodes
・The High King's Erencia Route
・The Kingdom of Merrill Route
・Rebellion of Mars Route ※Select "After Story" on the title screen.

◆Motion Events◆
Some event scenes use motion animation to create a more realistic effect than ever before.
NOTE.
All event scenes do not include motion.


[Story]
　The main character, Mars, works hard at his job as a knight so that he and Erencia will be accepted as lovers.
Erencia also tries to fulfill her duties as a queen so that she and Mars will be accepted as lovers. ......

[CHARACTER]



●Erencia●

Height: 158cm
Three sizes: 92/57/83
Hobby: Singing
Favorite food: sweets from the store where she ate with Mars (things she can eat with her hands)
Dislikes: Anything that takes a lot of time and effort to eat.

Princess of the Kingdom of Liberline.
She is known as the "Jewel of Liberline" for her good looks, and is easily recognized for her self-confidence.

She is popular among the people because of her fast-paced personality and her cheerful and vivacious personality in front of others.
However, when she is surrounded only by her family members, she plays or lounges around, and Nadia gets angry with her.
She loves to buy food and eat, which Mars taught her how to do. (He likes to eat, sleep, and play.)




Japanese voice recording （※Male characters are not recorded)


◆Game Specifications◆

Novel game that can be read by clicking.
Heroine full voice
CG mode
Scene recollection


◆Content warning◆
This game contains content not suitable for all ages and
may not be suitable for display in the workplace.

Games containing nudity or sexual content, violence, sexual assault, non-consensual sex, sex with drugs, general adult content.
